channel.title: CLI :: Go Kure
channel.description: CLI Package The cli package provides shared utilities and abstractions for building command-line interfaces in the Kure and kurel tools. Components Factory — Dependency injection container for CLI commands, making them easier to test and configure IOStreams — Abstraction for stdin/stdout/stderr, enabling testable commands Printer — Output formatting supporting YAML, JSON, table, wide, and name formats (compatible with kubectl conventions) Config — Configuration file handling with merging from defaults, config files, environment variables, and flags API Reference pkg.go.dev/github.com/go-kure/kure/pkg/cli
